::Tasmanian Kid::
TK looked at the autoguns that were aimed his way. "I am sooooo screwed...." 
he muttered, seeing he was surrounded by preds. "oh, wait! why didn't i 
think of this before?!" he said as a panel on his lower arm opened. He 
pushed several buttons as there was a strange humming sound emmited from his 
backpack. Suddenly, Tasmanian Kid seemed to vanish from veiw. "Stealth is a 
deadly tool. I use it well." he said.

>::Autofire::
>
>Autofire nods. Ominous had been a clever bot, yes. Autofire chuckles 
>quietly,
>remembering Ominous beating up Zardus in the same battle that Autofire and
>Adrax had killed each other. He takes out a scanner, turning it on to scan
>the walls for any exits.
